originalText.text:
Evelyn is always warm and welcoming.  The vibe is chill and the shop is clean and fresh.
Jerry, Barber, is amazingly skilled and focused. He took care of both my Husband and my Son in an hr.
One of the best little beauty/barber shops in NY!
Customer for lifeüëç

originalText.text: Evelyn's cuts is the best. I'm always satisfied and pleased with the wash, blow out, flat iron or curls that I receive. I recommend that all people try Evelyn's Cuts. They will be happy for life. The products she use are great. She communicates with you about your hair and let you know what she's putting in it. 5 stars all the way.
